package.name: nControl
package.shortDescription: Connecting a joystick to your device.

descriptionlist.description: nControl supports Sony Dual Shock 4 / Slim, XBox One, Evo VR Pro and Nintendo Switch Joy-Con controllers in all MFI controller-enabled applications, including emulators like Provenance. More information at http://wiki.awkwardtv.org/wiki/NControl
